comment.text: This translation key describes the action of moving right without changing the selection in a user interface component. It appears in a hotkey panel, specifically next to the "→" arrow key symbol, indicating that this key combination will move focus or selection to the right side of an element or container.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Move right without changing selection" implies a command or instruction. The Azerbaijani translation "Seçimi dəyişmədən sağa hərəkət edin" is a literal translation that is grammatically correct, but sounds slightly unnatural as an instruction in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Seçimi dəyişmədən sağ tərəfə keç".

The translation "選択を変えずに移動（右）" doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Move right without changing selection.' While '移動（右）' indicates moving right, the phrase '選択を変えずに' (without changing selection) could be more accurately represented to emphasize the 'without changing selection' part. It's a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 選択を維持して右へ移動

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ຍ້າຍຂວາໂດຍບໍ່ມີການປ່ຽນການເລືອກ" is a literal translation and may not convey the intended meaning as naturally as possible in Lao. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise phrasing like "ຍ້າຍຂວາມື້ບໍ່ປ່ຽນການເລືອກ" or "ຍ້າຍຂວາບໍ່ປ່ຽນການເລືອກ" which flows more naturally in Lao.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Перейти вправо без изменения области выделения" is a bit too literal and formal. It doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Move right without changing selection' in the context of hotkeys. 'Области выделения' translates to 'selection area,' which is more complex than just 'selection'.

The translation 'තේරීම වෙනස් නොකර දකුණට යන්න' while literally meaning 'go right without changing selection', doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Move right without changing selection'. 'Move right' implies an action performed on something, which isn't clearly conveyed.  A more natural phrasing might emphasize the movement action.

The translation 'Seçimi değiştirmeden sağa git' while understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of "Move right without changing selection". A more precise translation would emphasize the 'move' action, rather than just describing the result.

The translation "向右移动而不改变选定" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Move right without changing selection." The phrase "选定" (xuǎn dìng) typically refers to 'selection' as a process or the act of selecting, not the selected item itself. A more accurate translation would emphasize 'the selected item'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 向右移动，不改变选中对象 (Xiàng yòu yídòng, bù gǎibiàn xuǎnzhōng duìxiàng)
